message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I can see you're serious about getting this product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. Is that something you'd be willing to do?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm starting to think you're not serious about paying a fair price, Bob. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115, but that's as low as I can go. Take it or leave it.
I understand you're trying to get a good price, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $88. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm not going to budge much further, Bob. I'll meet you at $99, but that's as low as I can go. If you're still interested, let me know.
I'm really interested in the product, but I've got to make a decision soon. I'm willing to meet you at $85. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. Will you sell it to me for that price?
